root.message: All metadata fields for the indicator 11-2-1, translated into en
root.data: Goal 11. Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable11.2 By 2030, ensure access for all to safe, accessible and sustainable transport systems at an affordable cost, improving road safety, including by expanding public transport, with particular attention to needs people in vulnerable situations, women, children, people with disabilities and the elderly11.2.1 Proportion of the population located within 15 minutes of a bus stationThis is the proportion of people who use less than 15 minutes of walking to get to the bus stationNumber of populations using less than 15 minutes' walk to reach the bus station, compared to the total populationNot available
